page.title: 17TRANSPORT
page.content: The bus service through Belmont Village is part of the Greater Manchester{Transport}system and runs between the Sailing Club at the far end of the Village and Bolton{Bus Station,}along the A675.There are about ten buses a day, the first leaving the Village at 6.50 and the last at 23.15.The buses are usually{single decker,}manned by one conductor/ driver. There is one bus a week to Blackburn despite the fact that Belmont is part of the Borough of Blackburn. Most people who live in the survey area find it necessary to have their own{cars}owing to the infrequency of buses and the isolated situation of the community.
